data.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones weâ€™ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: You can't focus on what's going wrong.  There's always a way to turn things around.
data.author: Joy, from 'Inside Out'

data.quote: Never look back, darling.  It distracts from the now.
data.author: Edna Mode, from 'The Incredibles'

data.quote: Our fate lives within us; you only have to be brave enough to see it.
data.author: Merida, from 'Brave'

data.quote: If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
data.author: Gusteau, from 'Ratatouille'

data.quote: All students can learn and succeed, but not on the same day in the same way.
data.author: William G. Spady

data.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
data.author: Norman Vaughan
